body.p: The Mini PDU has (20) output receptacles ((16) x 30A, (4) x 20A) in the rear of the unit, numbered to correspond to front panelboard circuit breakers. Mini PDU Output Receptacles

A customer output cable kit (MOD67210) is provided with the Mini PDU with the following cables:
(8) x 20 ft. 30A SOOW 8/3C AWG, 90°C, 600VAC, Flex with Hubble connectors HBL2621/HBL2623
(8) x 50 ft. 30A SOOW 8/3C AWG, 90°C, 600VAC, Flex with Hubble connectors HBL2621/HBL2623
(4) x 20 ft. 20A SOOW 8/3C AWG, 90°C, 600VAC, Flex with Hubble connectors HBL2311/HBL2313
Cables are intended to be plugged into server power receptacles on one end and to the Mini PDU back panel receptacles on the other end.

Cable servers to the Mini PDU:Work from top to bottom.
To make the best use of cable space and keep cables orderly, connect cables to the top row of receptacles first, then each lower row successively.
Select an appropriate cable for the server and connect it to server input power.
Run the cable down the Cable Ladder, securing it to the Cable Ladder.
Run the cable through the Cable Entry Brush Panel to the correct output receptacle.
Connect to the receptacle and lock.
Cable Servers to Mini PDU
